special_text:
[+2]: Draw cards equal to the difference between the number of cards in your hand the greatest number of cards in a player's hand.
[-X]: The owner of target nonland permanent with mana value equal to the number of cards in your hand minus X puts it on the bottom of their library.
[-10]: You get an emblem with “If you would draw a card while your library has no cards in it, an opponent of your choice loses the game instead.”
